attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This website is coming into disrepute due to inane comments. Consideration should be given to moderating this website and removing content which does not agree with stated rules (i.e. use of name when requested).

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
